translations: [计]微型计算机；微电脑（microcomputer 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Diskettes are used on all microcomputers.
sentences.translation: 软盘应用于所有的微型计算机。

sentences.sentence: Microcomputers are very small in size, as is shown in Fig.5.
sentences.translation: 如图5所示，微型计算机体积很小。

sentences.sentence: On-board microcomputers improve fuel economy and reduce emissions.
sentences.translation: 车上的微型计算机不仅节约了燃料而且减少了气体排放。
